price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A rán (Ànábì) Mūsā àti ọmọ-ìyá rẹ̀ (Ànábì) Hārūn níṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn àmì Wa àti ẹ̀rí pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma arsalnā mūsā wa-akhāhu hārūna biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
